description:
How the Blocktek University Token (BKU) works and how it's used within the BlockTek Ecosystem

Students
Students can use BKU tokens to purchase premium courses and tools directly from this learning platform. BKU is the only form of payment accepted. Students who complete courses are sent a certificate transaction on the blockchain showing they’ve completed coursework, every certificate is stored on the blockchain and is irrefutable

Instructors
BKU is used to reward user’s who contribute to the knowledge of others. We award BKU tokens to anyone who can contribute quality, cohesive content to the learning community. In addition contributors who submit premium paid content receive a portion of the BKU tokens used by learners to pay for the courses

Businesses
We understand that not every business wants to learn the in’s and out’s of blockchain technology but still want to use it to grow their existing infrastructure. We offer smart contract creation services, token creation services, and comprehensive live training to employees. These services are paid in BKU.
name: Blocktek University
